item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "I solemnly swear that I am up to no good." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Danielle add a quote by J K. Rowling
item.description: "I don't go looking for trouble. Trouble usually finds me." -- J K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Not my daughter, you bitch!" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "You know, Minister, I disagree with Dumbledore on many counts...but you cannot deny he's got style..." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Albus Severus," Harry said quietly, so that nobody but Ginny could hear, and she was tactful enough to pretend to be waving to Rose, who was now on the train, "you were named for two headmasters of Hogwarts. One of them was a Slytherin and he was probably the bravest man I ever knew." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Let us step into the night and pursue that flighty temptress, adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Yeah, Quirrell was a great teacher. There was just that minor drawback of him having Lord Voldemort sticking out of the back of his head!" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Indifference and neglect often do much more damage than outright dislike." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J. K. Rowling
item.description: "The thing about growing up with Fred and George," said Ginny thoughtfully, "is that you sort of start thinking anything's possible if you've got enough nerve." -- J. K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. rowling
item.description: "Fear of a name increases fear of the thing itself." -- J.K. rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Of all the trees we could've hit, we had to get one that hits back." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "He must have known I'd want to leave you." "No, he must have known you would always want to come back." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Youth can not know how age thinks and feels. But old men are guilty if they forget what it was to be young." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "One can never have enough socks," said Dumbledore. "Another Christmas has come and gone and I didn't get a single pair. People will insist on giving me books." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It's going to be all right, sir," Harry said over and over again, more worried by Dumbledore's silence than he had been by his weakened voice. "We're nearly there ... I can Apparate us both back ... don't worry ..." "I am not worried, Harry," said Dumbledore, his voice a little stronger despite the freezing water. "I am with you." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Harry was left to ponder in silence the depths to which girls would sink to get revenge." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "You should write a book," Ron told Hermione as he cut up his potatoes, "translating mad things girls do so boys can understand them." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Dumbledore will only leave from Hogwarts when there are none loyal to him!" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J. K. Rowling
item.description: "There are some things you can't share without ending up liking each other, and knocking out a twelve-foot mountain troll is one of them." -- J. K. Rowling

item.title: Danielle add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Look...at...me..." he whispered. The green eyes found the black, but after a second, something in the depths of the dark pair seemed to vanish, leaving them fixed, blank, and empty. The hand holding Harry thudded to the floor, and Snape moved no more." -- J.K. Rowling
